flawed_nl_solution:
The necklace stand needs another 12 – 5 = <<12-5=7>>7 necklaces.
This will cost the store 7 * 4 = $<<7*4=28>>28.
The ring display needs another 30 – 18 = <<30-18=12>>12 rings.
This will cost the store 12 * 10 = $<<12*10=120>>120.
The bracelet display needs another 15 – 8 = <<15-8=10>>10 bracelets.
This will cost the store 10 * 5 = $<<10*5=50>>50.
In total, the store needs to pay 28 + 120 +50 = $<<28+120+50=198>>198.
#### 198

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 7, not 10. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
